revised_title: Observations on the Posterior Lobes of the Cerebrum in Quadrumana and the Existence of Hippocampus Minor in Lemuridae
tldr: The author examines the posterior lobes of the cerebrum in various Quadrumana species and discovers a well-developed hippocampus minor in the Galago and Stenops, indicating their position among the Quadrumana and their separation from other animals.
